game.shortDescription: The Painter Boss Paradise DLC provides a fresh coat of paint to Castle Crashers with new main menu art and redraws for all playable characters and weapons! Join Paint Junior, the game’s newest official character, and bring your custom characters to life with the Steam Workshop!
